title: Trump Tarrifs, Border Deal, Rep. Denver Riggleman
itunes:title: Trump Tarrifs, Border Deal, Rep. Denver Riggleman
description:
Kevin discusses the details of the the bipartisan border funding agreement and the prospects for President Trump to sign the deal as well as US/China trade with guests Virginia Republican Congressman Denver Riggleman and Julia Manchester Reporter @ The Hill.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
